m:MaterialTitle.title: Default
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can make your navbar fixed by adding: type='fixed'

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialNavBar align="right" color="white" logoResource="{res.ic_gwt_logo}"> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="About" textColor="blue" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="Buttons" textColor="blue"/></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="Forms" textColor="blue"/></m:nav> </m:MaterialNavBar>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Left Aligned Links
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can easily align your navbar by adding: type='right' or type='left'

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialNavBar align="left" color="white" logoResource="{res.ic_gwt_logo}"> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="About" textColor="blue" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="Buttons" textColor="blue"/></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="Forms" textColor="blue"/></m:nav> </m:MaterialNavBar>

<m:MaterialNavBar color="white" logoResource="{res.ic_gwt_logo}"> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="Style" icon="mdi-action-dashboard" iconPosition="left" textColor="blue" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="Delete" icon="mdi-action-delete" iconPosition="left" textColor="blue" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="Code" icon="mdi-action-settings-ethernet" iconPosition="left" textColor="blue"/></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink text="Others" icon="mdi-navigation-more-vert" iconPosition="left" textColor="blue"/></m:nav> </m:MaterialNavBar>

<m:MaterialNavBar color="white" logoResource="{res.ic_gwt_logo}"> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-action-dashboard" textColor="blue" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-action-delete" textColor="blue" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-action-settings-ethernet" textColor="blue"/></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-navigation-more-vert" textColor="blue"/></m:nav> </m:MaterialNavBar>

<m:MaterialNavBar color="blue darken-4" logoResource="{res.ic_gwt_logo}"> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-action-dashboard" textColor="white" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-action-delete" textColor="white" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-action-settings-ethernet" textColor="white"/></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-navigation-more-vert" textColor="white"/></m:nav> </m:MaterialNavBar>

<m:MaterialNavBar wave="purple" color="purple darken-4" logoResource="{res.ic_gwt_logo}"> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-action-dashboard" textColor="white" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-action-delete" textColor="white" /></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-action-settings-ethernet" textColor="white"/></m:nav> <m:nav><m:MaterialLink icon="mdi-navigation-more-vert" textColor="white"/></m:nav> </m:MaterialNavBar>
